title: Add shiny footer credit text

requirements.text: Add a shiny/animated credit label with the exact text "Made By Sunyad Ahmed Shrabon" to the global app footer (in the shared layout) and style it with a subtle “shine” effect that matches the existing school-friendly theme.

quotes: add a shine:"Made By Sunyad Ahmed Shrabon"

acceptanceCriteria: The footer displays the exact text "Made By Sunyad Ahmed Shrabon" on all pages that render the shared layout/footer.
The credit text has a visible but subtle shine animation (e.g., moving highlight) without harming readability.
The shine animation respects users who prefer reduced motion (when `prefers-reduced-motion: reduce` is set, the animation is disabled or replaced with a non-animated style).
No user-facing text is added in any language other than English.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend immutablePaths (e.g., frontend/src/main.tsx and the hooks listed as immutable).
Implement the change using the existing React + Tailwind CSS styling approach already used in the project.
nonGoals: Do not change authentication, routing, or backend behavior.
Do not add new pages or navigation items as part of this change.
